books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers investigates a number of bombings directed against a superstore chain that is seeking to open a store in a Minnesota river town.
books.name: SHOCK WAVE

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: For Jack Reacher, an elite military police officer, it all started in 1997. A lonely railroad track. A crime scene. A cover-up.
books.name: THE AFFAIR

books.author: by Darcie Chan
books.description: Only one man knows an abused widow, which revealed will change many lives in her small Vermont town.
books.name: THE MILL RIVER RECLUSE

books.author: by Sophie Kinsella
books.description: A woman reveals the most intimate details of her life to a man who turns out to be the C.E.O. of the company for which she works.
books.name: CAN YOU KEEP A SECRET?

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A woman, her daughter and a man accused of murder evade the authorities as they search for her dead husband’s secrets.
books.name: LETHAL

books.author: by Chris Culver
books.description: Against orders, a former homicide detective begins an investigation into his niece's murder.
books.name: THE ABBEY

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross’s wedding plans are put on hold when an elusive gunman begins picking off crooked Washington politicians.
books.name: CROSS FIRE

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: A young man who finds a bag of diamonds is stalked by competing assassins.
books.name: KILL ME IF YOU CAN

books.author: by James Wesley, Rawles
books.description: Individuals use survivalist skills to defend themselves after the United States suffers a socioeconomic collapse.
books.name: SURVIVORS

books.author: by Erin Morgenstern
books.description: Two young rivals at a magical circus become collaborators as they fall in love.
books.name: THE NIGHT CIRCUS

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: A doctor who has dedicated his life to eradicating a disease discovers that his patients are being hunted by a serial killer; first published in 1991.
books.name: MIRACLE CURE

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch is on the scene in three never-before-collected stories.
books.name: SUICIDE RUN

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: Puppies that need good homes and an ex-husband loom large in the last installment of the Cedar Cove series.
books.name: 1225 CHRISTMAS TREE LANE

books.author: by P. J. Alderman
books.description: An Oregon fire chief becomes entangled with a woman whose brother is a suspect in a deadly shipboard arson blaze.
books.name: A KILLING TIDE
